flawed_nl_solution:
Maria has $120 and received $250 from her mother. So she has 120 + 250 = $<<120+250=340>>340.
As the price of the bike stands at $600, Maria needs 600 – 340 = $<<600-340=260>>260 more to buy the bike.
#### 260

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 370, not 340. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
